Itâ€™s only 10 minutes from the apartment to the Norfolk & Norwich Hospital, but an intervening school and badly-phased set of traffic lights can extend this rather. Ah well, just two more runs to do on this chemo cycle. And yes, the car was well and truly stationary when I took this shot.
